author: rbowen
msg: The "rewrite guide", so called, has now been completely rewritten in
trunk. The consensus is that we don't need to do anything with the 1.3,
2.0, or 2.2 version of this document, and are content to make it awesome

msg: Introduce <If> as an alternative to mod_rewrite in the "avoiding

author: rjung
msg: Move Entry to an inner class of FastRemovalDequeue.
All implementation details of Entry are now opaque
to the consumer of the FastRemovalDequeue.
Remove double generification when using the inner
